Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells are characterized by very high efficiency, low emissions level, and large fuel flexibility.
Titulo: A distributed real-time model of degradation in a solid oxide fuel cell, part II: Analysis of fuel cell performance and potential failures

Sentencas: Unfortunately, their elevated costs and relatively short lifetimes reduce the economic feasibility of these technologies at the present time.
Titulo: A distributed real-time model of degradation in a solid oxide fuel cell, part II: Analysis of fuel cell performance and potential failures

Sentencas: Several mechanisms contribute to degrade fuel cell performance during time, and the study of these degradation modes and potential mitigation actions is critical to ensure the durability of the fuel cell and their long-term stability.
Titulo: A distributed real-time model of degradation in a solid oxide fuel cell, part II: Analysis of fuel cell performance and potential failures

Sentencas: In this work, localized degradation of a solid oxide fuel cell is modeled in real-time and its effects on various cell parameters are analyzed.
Titulo: A distributed real-time model of degradation in a solid oxide fuel cell, part II: Analysis of fuel cell performance and potential failures

Sentencas: Profile distributions of overpotential, temperature, heat generation, and temperature gradients in the stack are investigated during degradation.
Titulo: A distributed real-time model of degradation in a solid oxide fuel cell, part II: Analysis of fuel cell performance and potential failures

Sentencas: Several causes of failure could occur in the fuel cell if no proper control actions are applied.
Titulo: A distributed real-time model of degradation in a solid oxide fuel cell, part II: Analysis of fuel cell performance and potential failures

Sentencas: A local analysis of critical parameters conducted shows where the issues are and how they could be mitigated in order to extend the life of the cell.
Titulo: A distributed real-time model of degradation in a solid oxide fuel cell, part II: Analysis of fuel cell performance and potential failures
